meta.description: On November 7, Dr Chris Shoemaker shared shocking information with the World Council for Health about the Covid-19 mRNA injections.

title: What You're Not Being Told About C-19 mRNA Injections
cleaned_text:
Speaking at General Assembly Meeting #64 on Monday, November 7, Dr Chris Shoemaker shared shocking information with us about the Covid-19 mRNA injections.
• None Chris Shoemaker is a comprehensive Physician in Ontario and a member of the College of Family Physicians of Canada. He has worked in Emergency Medicine and as a Hospitalist in both Ontario and British Columbia, Canada. More recently he was part of the Eastern Ontario Response Team to Covid-19. Dr Shoemaker has declared the need to ‘Save the Children – End the Vax’.

This is an edited segment from the weekly live General Assembly meeting on November 7, 2022. This video is also available on Rumble, Odysee, and Bitchute.

opengraph.title: What You're Not Being Told About C-19 mRNA Injections
opengraph.description: Shocking information about C-19 mRNA injections presented by Dr Chris Shoemaker.
